subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When the normally undemonstrative Moises Alou was ejected on Wednesday, it suggested a larger point about the game: the Mets seemed to have things under control, until they did not.
snippet: When the normally undemonstrative Moises Alou was ejected on Wednesday, it suggested a larger point about the game: the Mets seemed to have things under control, until they did not.
